author: Siobhan Neela-Stock
title: 5 companies that give back when you buy a face mask
description: Are you looking to buy a face mask to protect yourself, your community, and do some good too? Now that the CDC recommends everyone wear a cloth face mask in public places where it's difficult to social distance, it's smart to have one on hand. We've compiled …
